TextBody:
Hi Warren,

Please find below the new EPP server images we discussed about:
 

	5.9.4.0 Install Image as OVF for on prem deployment: 
	
		https://download.endpointprotector.com/virtual_appliance/V5940/Endpoint-Protector-5.9.4.0-Virtual-Appliance-64b-OVF.zip
		https://download.endpointprotector.com/virtual_appliance/V5940/Endpoint-Protector-5.9.4.0-Virtual-Appliance-64b-OVF.md5
	
	
	5.9.4.0 Install Image as Hyper-V for on prem deployment: 
	
		https://download.endpointprotector.com/virtual_appliance/V5940/Endpoint-Protector-5.9.4.0-Virtual-Appliance-64b-VHDX.zip 
		https://download.endpointprotector.com/virtual_appliance/V5940/Endpoint-Protector-5.9.4.0-Virtual-Appliance-64b-VHDX.md5 
	
	


Regarding the issue in this ticket, the network adapters from the EPP server were missing. We re-added them from the backend and after that it worked.

We are closing this ticket.

Best Regards,
Flaviu Moldovan | Technical Support Engineer
Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix
DLP | Device Control | Content Aware Protection | eDiscovery | Enforced Encryption
www.endpointprotector.com
